headline: Everest Group Announces Dividend
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, May 15, 2025--Everest Group, Ltd. announced that its Board of Directors declared a dividend of $2.00 per common share. This dividend will be payable on or before June 13, 2025 to all shareholders of record as of May 28, 2025.

raw.headline: Everest Group Announces Dividend
